name: cameronsjo
description: Plugin directory for Cameron's Claude Code plugins. Each plugin lives in its own repo.
author: cameronsjo

registry.note: Plugins have moved to individual repos. Install from their marketplaces directly.

repos.name: essentials
repos.description: Personality commands - hype, sass, roast, turbo, catchup

repos.name: dev-toolkit
repos.description: Development workflow tools - logging agents, project checks, release pipelines

repos.name: session-continuity
repos.description: Cross-session context with timeline logging and inbox capture

repos.name: mcp-toolkit
repos.description: MCP server development toolkit - architecture patterns, tools-as-code

repos.name: obsidian-dev
repos.description: Obsidian plugin development - scaffolding, TypeScript, GitHub Actions

repos.name: homebridge-dev
repos.description: Homebridge plugin development - HAP mappings, accessory patterns

repos.name: image-gen-toolkit
repos.description: Image generation toolkit with prompt engineering for Gemini 3 Pro Image

repos.name: homelab
repos.description: Homelab infrastructure context - Unraid server, media stack, Docker services
